Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.service.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
Service class for handling user-related operations. Provides functionality for user authentication, registration, and profile management. This class interacts with the database to perform CRUD operations on user data.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public User login(String email, String password) throws SQLException
      Authenticates a user with the provided email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email address
      password - The user's password (should be hashed in production)
      Returns:
      User object if authentication successful, null otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • register

      public boolean register(User user) throws SQLException
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing registration details
      Returns:
      true if registration successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(int userId, String newPassword) throws SQLException
      Changes a user's password.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      newPassword - The new password (should be hashed in production)
      Returns:
      true if password change successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getUserById

      public User getUserById(int userId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      User object if found, null otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getStudentsByCourseId

      public List<User> getStudentsByCourseId(int courseId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves all students enrolled in a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course
      Returns:
      List of User objects representing enrolled students
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs
